meanings.definition: The production of unwanted noise in a microphone due to mechanical vibrations.
meanings.sent1: The microphonics in the microphone made it difficult to hear the speaker clearly.
meanings.sent2: The technician fixed the microphonics issue by securing the microphone properly.
meanings.sent3: The microphonics in the microphone seemed to have a mind of its own, adding a mysterious touch to the speech.
meanings.sent4: The microphonics whispered secrets of the room, revealing more than intended.
meanings.sent5: The annoying microphonics buzzed like a persistent mosquito, disrupting the event.
